title: Lewis Hamilton sings as his team reign champions for 6th year
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Lewis Hamilton shared a singalong celebration after him and his team, Mercedes-AMG F1, won the Formula One World Championship for the sixth year.

Winning one is already an accomplishment, but winning six?

The racing driver shared the moment on his Instagram as he complimented his teammates on working hard and persevering.

Along with the clip, they all graced us with a stirring rendition of Queen’s We Are The Champions.

He captioned the video: ‘We are 6 times World Champions, wow it’s still not sunk in. You can’t imagine how hard it’s been for us all, we lost our dear friend Niki this year, it’s been a tough battle but this one is definitely for him.

‘I am so privileged to be apart of this team, to be able to contribute and share this with them. Some people will never understand how it feels to win and lose as we do so often, the highs and lows [sic].’

Lewis continued: ‘But we get through it together, we win and we lose together. Im not perfect, im not always going to say or do the right things but as you can see here, I am for the team 1000%. Well done guys and everyone back at the factory. Thank you for all you do [sic],’ along with a praying emoji.

The entire team secured the Formula 1 record thanks to Valterri Bottas winning the Japanese Grand Prix with team-mate Lewis third behind Ferrari’s Sebastian Vettel.

Lewis Hamilton is at it again (Picture: Dan Mullan/Getty Images)

The result sealed the constructors’ title with four races still to go and, while Hamilton is not quite the world champion yet, only Valteri can catch him.

Fans took to Twitter to share their delight in the new title.

One use tweeted: ‘An incredible achievement by everyone involved from everyone throughout the team that’s in Japan and at home..hope everyone enjoys the celebrations tonight..your time soon Lewis what an amazing double that will be..stay Blessed massive congratulations to everyone #ATeamComeTrue’

‘Excellent achievement for the team champ! Thoroughly deserved, as will your 6th championship when it comes,’ another use tweeted. ‘Great drive today as well and very unlucky to only take P3 but enjoy the teams achievement this weekend & then let’s focus on wrapping up the wdc #TeamLH #LH44 #6for44.’
